    • startGame

      public static void startGame() throws IllegalArgumentException, InvocationTargetException, NoSuchMethodException, InstantiationException, IllegalAccessException
      Parse players arguments and create a new instance of Game
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when given argument is unknown
      InvocationTargetException - when the creation of the player throw an exception
      NoSuchMethodException - when constructor with given parameter in Class.getConstructor(Class[]) doesn't exist
      InstantiationException - when the instanciation of the player is impossible (like when class is abstract), is probably never called
      IllegalAccessException - when the instanciation of thr player is impossible (like a private constructor), is probably never called

      The class of the View to use
      Throws:
